data.description: Not the biggest, most powerful surf, but I still had a great run at the Viana event in Portugal, somehow making it through 8 rounds and into the final day. I would have never expected this but It turns out I have made it to the podium every year they have run this event since the first international world tour event in 94.

Morey Boogie Mach 77-S the best of morey boogie

Tom, from my first board I found at spencer park on the big island. I was hooked. I grew up boogie boarding. Light house, kapanaia, Keokea, and pololu valley in my hometown Kohala. Then, old A's, banyans, and pretty much the whole big island. Thank you for bringing joy to my life. Mahalo nui, and thanks Mike for sharing, you da man😊
